definition: cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Are you a member of the sleepless elite? High-flyers who get by on a few hours a night
sentences.chinese: 你是天生的“夜貓子精英”嗎？

sentences.english: Maybe you’re a night owl who cranks out great design during the wee hours.
sentences.chinese: 也可能你是個夜貓子，在凌晨會創作出精彩的設計。

sentences.english: You may be a "night person" or something in between.
sentences.chinese: 你可能是“夜貓子”或介於兩者之間。

sentences.english: Macejka was always a night owl, according to her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她媽媽說，馬切伊卡一直是個夜貓子。

definition: pattern matching (puzzle game)/matching (type of test question in which presented items are to be paired up)
to not go home until drunk (idiom)/let's make a night of it!
to buy soy sauce/it's none of my business ("I’m just here to buy some soy sauce")
